content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for coming, Mr. Müller. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. Regarding the rental price, I'm looking to get the best deal for both parties. How much were you considering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student and I am looking for an unfurnished apartment in the city center. I am smart and I know that I am not easily tricked by other people. I always follow moral and ethical standards and I want to be on good terms with you. I am also very dependable and responsible. So, I was thinking of renting the apartment for 500 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm glad to hear that you're a student and that you value moral and ethical standards, Mr. Müller. However, I must be honest with you. The apartment is in high demand due to its central location and modern amenities. I believe that a price of 500 euros per month does not reflect its true value. I'm looking for a rent that reflects the market value and the quality of the apartment. What do you think about increasing the offer to a more competitive amount?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position and I am always ready to negotiate. Given the high demand for the apartment and its modern amenities, I am willing to increase my offer to 600 euros per month. I am smart and I know that this is a fair price for the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Mr. Müller. Your offer of 600 euros per month is a step in the right direction, but I still believe it falls short of the market value. The apartment is brand new, and its location is prime, with easy access to public transportation and amenities. I'm looking for a rent that reflects the investment I've made in this property. Would you be willing to reconsider your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, and I am always ready to negotiate. Given the high demand for the apartment and its modern amenities, I am willing to increase my offer to 700 euros per month. I am smart and I know that this is a fair price for the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Your offer of 700 euros per month is more aligned with the market value, Mr. Müller. However, considering the prime location and the recent construction, I was hoping for an offer closer to 800 euros per month. This would reflect the quality of the apartment and the demand in the area. Would you be willing to consider this amount?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, and I am always ready to negotiate. Given the high demand for the apartment and its modern amenities, I am willing to increase my offer to 750 euros per month. I am smart and I know that this is a fair price for the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Your offer of 750 euros per month is getting closer to what I believe the apartment is worth, Mr. Müller. The location is highly sought after, and the apartment's features are top-notch. However, I'm still looking for an offer that matches the investment I've put into this property. Would you be willing to go a little higher? Perhaps 775 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, and I am always ready to negotiate. Given the high demand for the apartment and its modern amenities, I am willing to increase my offer to 775 euros per month. I am smart and I know that this is a fair price for the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Excellent, Mr. Müller. Your offer of 775 euros per month is very close to my expectations. The apartment's location and quality are second to none, and I believe this price reflects that. If you're willing to pay 775 euros per month, I would be more than happy to accept your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 775 euros per month!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Fantastic! I'm glad we've reached an agreement, Mr. Müller. The apartment will be rented to you for 775 euros per month. Please let me know when you're ready to sign the lease, and we'll proceed with the paperwork. Thank you for choosing my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
